products.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
products.description: Our seasonal specialty is back! Enjoy this spicy and flavorful latte that will warm up your winter days.

products.title: Chile Spiced Mocha
products.description: Our best-seller! A hearty chile spiced mocha that will help to wake you up in the morning. Flavors of warm, smooth cocoa, spicy red chiles, and a aromatic cinnamon finish.
